DOC.brief_summary: The hypothesis of this study is that PGF2alpha does not induce headache or dilatation of brain vessels.
DOC.brief_title: Prostaglandin F2alpha in a Human Headache Model
DOC.criteria: Healthy volunteers Primary Headache Headache on the day of the investigation Hypertension Hypotension Pregnant/nursing Daily intake of medication (except oral contraceptives) Cardiovascular or central nervous system (CNS) disease Drug/alcohol abuse Psychiatric disease
